description:
Good search experience for your users is about more than just a more
efficient way to find models containing certain word or phrase. In this
talk we'll go through what are the relevant parts of search and how to
best implement them (we'll use Elasticsearch for actual examples).

We will start discussing data modelling, moving on to simple search, add
facets for easier navigation and discoverability, spell checking ("did
you mean?") and auto-complete. In the remaining time we'll see about
possibilities for further enhancing your search by tracking user
searches or providing stored search functionality.
title: From __icontains to search
